lyric:
[00:01.43]
[00:05.75]I might never be your knight in shining armor
[00:10.61]I might never be the one you take home to mother
[00:15.21]And I might never be the one who brings you flowers
[00:20.14]But I can be the one be the one tonight
[00:24.85]When I first saw you
[00:27.11]From across the room
[00:29.48]I could tell that you were curious
[00:33.12]Oh yeah
[00:34.47]Girl I hope you're sure
[00:36.68]What you're looking for
[00:39.30]'Cause I'm not good at making promises
[00:42.71]But if you like causing trouble up in hotel rooms
[00:47.61]And if you like having secret little rendezvous
[00:52.43]If you like to do the things you know that we shouldn't do
[00:57.33]Baby I'm perfect
[00:59.65]Baby I'm perfect for you
[01:02.04]And if you like midnight driving with the windows down
[01:06.78]And if you like going places we can't even pronounce
[01:11.64]If you like to do whatever you've been dreaming about
[01:16.53]Baby you're perfect
[01:18.83]Baby you're perfect
[01:21.09]So let's start right now
[01:24.90]I might never be the hand you put your heart in
[01:29.76]Or the arms that hold you any time you want them
[01:34.56]But that don't mean that we can't live here in the moment
[01:39.22]'Cause I can be the one you love from time to time
[01:43.69]When I first saw you
[01:46.33]From across the room
[01:48.71]I could tell that you were curious
[01:52.29]Oh yeah

[02:25.98]And if you like going places we can't even pronounce
[02:30.93]If you like to do whatever you've been dreaming about
[02:35.64]Baby you're perfect
[02:38.04]Baby you're perfect
[02:40.33]So let's start right now
[02:42.78]And if you like cameras flashing every time we go out
[02:50.25]Oh yeah
[02:52.64]And if you're looking for someone to write your breakup songs about
[02:57.47]Baby I'm perfect
[02:59.71]Baby we're perfect
[03:02.08]But if you like causing trouble up in hotel rooms
[03:06.82]And if you like having secret little rendezvous
[03:11.62]If you like to do the things you know that we shouldn't do
[03:16.51]Baby I'm perfect

[03:30.99]If you like to do whatever you've been dreaming about
[03:35.65]Baby you're perfect
[03:38.02]Baby you're perfect

tlyric:
[by:-白泽]
[00:05.75]我可能永远也不会成为你那身着闪亮盔甲的骑士
[00:10.61]我可能永远也不会成为你带去见家长的那个人
[00:15.21]我也可能永远也不会为你奉上鲜花
[00:20.14]但在今晚，我能成为你的唯一
[00:24.85]当我第一次看见你
[00:27.11]从房间的对面
[00:29.48]我就知道你很好奇
[00:33.12]哦耶
[00:34.47]女孩儿，我希望你明白
[00:36.68]你在寻找的是什么
[00:39.30]因为我不擅长许下诺言
[00:42.71]但如果你想要在酒店房间里闹些乱子
[00:47.61]如果你想要一些秘密的约会
[00:52.43]如果你想要做一些你明知道我们不该做的事
[00:57.33]那我再适合不过
[00:59.65]宝贝，我是你的真命天子
[01:02.04]如果你想要在半夜开着车窗兜风
[01:06.78]如果你想要去一些我们连名字都不会念的地方
[01:11.64]如果你想要做无论什么你曾梦想去做的事请
[01:16.53]那你再完美不过
[01:18.83]宝贝，你再完美不过
[01:21.09]让我们现在就行动吧
